title: Battleboss skin issue
body: Dear Riot, A friend of mine bought RP to gift me Battleboss Malzahar and Battleboss Ziggs. The Malzahar skin went through but the Ziggs one didnt. After figuring out the issue he sent it to the other Rexnut on his account. The reason for there being 2 Rexnuts is because the original who is my cousin regrettably committed suicide a little over a year ago and i wasnt able to take his summoner name so i made due with a greek letter to keep his league name alive. That being said he has sent in a ticket but was wondering if there was any way a forum post could get faster attention to get the Ziggs skin on the correct account or to refund his RP.

replies.body: Yeouch, that must feel pretty bad =\ . Since this was an error due to a weird misspelling, we should be able to get this figured out for you. Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and let them know this was simply due to confusing between names.
